name: cwrap-framework
description: Candy Wrapper (CWrap) is an open microframework for web developers and those learning web development.

scripts.start: node scripts/start.js && cross-env DEV=1 node server.js
scripts.dev: node build.js dev && node scripts/start.js dev && cross-env DEV=1 node server.js dev

author: Karol Piecuch <villager88pl@gmail.com>
